citation: Justice and Related Legislation (Further Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
Justice and Related Legislation (Further Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2023

An Act to amend the Appeal Costs Fund Act 1968, the Crimes at Sea Act 1999, the Criminal Code Act 1924, the Dangerous Criminals and High Risk Offenders Act 2021, the Goldamere Pty Ltd (Agreement) Act 1996, the Magistrates Court (Civil Division) Act 1992, the Nature Conservation Act 2002, the Ombudsman Act 1978, the Public Accounts Committee Act 1970, the Public Works Committee Act 1914, the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) Act 2016, the Tasmanian Civil and Administrative Tribunal Act 2020, the Urban Drainage Act 2013, the Workers Rehabilitation and Compensation Act 1988 and the Workers' (Occupational Diseases) Relief Fund Act 1954
[Royal Assent 27 November 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Justice and Related Legislation (Further Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.

PART 2 - Appeal Costs Fund Act 1968 Amended

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Appeal Costs Fund Act 1968 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Appeal Costs Fund Act 1968 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Appeal Costs Fund Act 1968 .
